item.title: Why I Still Use Plain HTML in 2025
item.description: I write JavaScript code for my employer. I love the JavaScript ecosystem (TypeScript, the frameworks, you name it). JS is the technology that allowed me to move 14,000 kilometers away from home together with my wife, across the ocean from Argentina to Germany.
